alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Oneida (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 2:29PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lincoln County through 315 PM CDT... At 228 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tripoli, or 30 miles west of Rhinelander, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tomahawk, Tripoli, Spirit Falls, Mccord and Clifford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
